II-F
Extended Disability Leave
Permanent employees are entitled to an extended disability leave of
one work week with pay for each year of service, cumulative to a
total of ten work weeks, which shall be allowed to reaccumulate to
this maximum through additional service after being used in full or
in part. Extended disability leave is not to be used until the normal
disability leave has been used.
Miscellaneous
Employees in the Washington office may work one of two hourly schedules
as determined by the proper administrative officer(s) concerned.
These schedules are: 8:30 AM to 5:00 PM, or 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM, with
an hour for lunch.
From Memorial Day to Labor Day, an additional schedule of 8:00 to 4:30
is offered for the employees.
All employees must submit time records to the accounting office twice
a month which have been approved by their immediate supervisor.
